I am few days short of releasing 2.0 version of RESTClient. I have put
a development snapshot of the build here:

http://wiztools.org/project/RESTClient/restclient-2.0-SNAPSHOT-jar-with-dependencies.jar

(4.5 MB download)

A sample request file is available:

http://wiztools.org/project/RESTClient/request.xml

The new features added:

* Can save requests and responses
* Support for groovy test scripts

Requesting interested people to test the tool and give feedback, bug
reports etc:

http://code.google.com/p/rest-client/issues/list

-- 
Regards,
Subhash Chandran S

http://rest-client.googlecode.com/
